updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #MarinaBay towards #AngMoKio are now operating normally.
[NSL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time from #MarinaBay to #AngMoKio towards JurongEast due to track fault near Bishan station.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #MarinaBay to #AngMoKio towards JurongEast due to track fault near Bishan.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train services between #AngMoKio and #Yishun are now operating normally.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time between #AngMoKio and #Yishun due to track fault.
